column5: I'm looking for a 1" bearing and hub assembly for today.  Canadian Tire says they have 'em for $149 which seems ok but does anyone have any other suggestions on where to try?....much appreciated  ok, just called City Marine on Queensway.....$43 dollars!!...for the whole assembly, greased and ready to slide on....emergency over
princess auto? or canada bearing perhaps?
I too was going to tell you to go to princess auto.
Thanks guys.  City Marine is minutes from my house and the price is definitely right.
Dave Sullivan (owner of City) is a great guy and a better mechanic! I highly recommend him and his staff  .  Tell him 'Simon' said hello.  Slayer
